full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZAB LAM BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI SGO NAS BYANG CHUB LAM RIM NYAMS LEN BYA TSUL RAB GSAL SGRON ME LAS NGAG 'DON ZUR BKOL BDE LAM SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022A *, ,(CES ZAB BLA MA'I RTZAL 'BYOR SGO NAS BYANG CHUB LAM RIM NYAMS SA LEN BYA TSUL RAB GSAL SGRON ME LAS NGAG 'DON ZUR BKOL BDE LAM SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BLA MA MCHOG GSUM LA MI PHYED PA'I DANG PA DANG LDAN PA, ,THAS RJE ME CHEN RJE NONG TSE NID SKYABS DANG, THAS JI PA THU LING HO GNYIS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR, DPAL MGON BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE MING CAN GYIS CHU MO GLANG LO'I STON ZLA THA MA'I TSE BRGYAD LA GUNG AER TE NI MER GENG TAS CHING GI SGAR NOR BU CHOS 'PHEL GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI CHOS DON GRUB KYIS BKYIS DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
